about_the_game:
Mafia Chess

Welcome to the underground world of Mafia Chess, where cunning rabbits reign supreme as Kings and Queens, sly eagles soar as Bishops, swift cats dash as Knights, and powerful gorillas tower as Rooks. Immerse yourself in a captivating cartoon-style chess experience where the animal kingdom meets the ruthless world of organized crime.

In "Mafia Chess," you'll dive headfirst into an exhilarating 2D chess game set in a unique universe where Mafia bosses rule the board. Every character is personified as an animal, adding a charming twist to the classic chess gameplay. Will you lead your rabbit King to victory, or will your cunning cat Knight make the decisive move?

Challenge your friends or opponents from around the world in thrilling 10+0 minute matches online, all powered by the renowned Lichess server. Whether you're a casual player looking for a quick game or a seasoned chess strategist honing your skills, "Mafia Chess" offers something for everyone.

But that's not all. "Mafia Chess" also incorporates a basic implementation of Stockfish, a powerful chess engine, to analyze your games and board positions. Sharpen your tactics, develop your strategies, and uncover the secrets of Mafia Chess to become the ultimate crime lord of the board.

Are you ready to make your move in this unique and exciting chess world? Join the ranks of the animal Mafia bosses and prove your dominance on the board. It's time to strategize, plot, and checkmate your way to victory in "Mafia Chess: Cartel Conquest."
